title: Pixel 2 XL vs Galaxy Note 8 - Hands on Comparison!
description:
Eber got some hands on time with the Samsung Galaxy Note 8 and Google's Pixel 2 XL.  These smartphones play in the same market space but which one should you buy?  We will do an unboxing and take a look at the Pixel 2 XL and Galaxy Note 8 cameras and other features to see if either comes out on top.  

Buy items in this video from Amazon at the links below:

Invest in storage that makes a difference w/ OCZ RD400 - http://geni.us/QUBBhV6 

Subscribe ► http://bit.ly/SubHWC

This video is sponsored by Toshiba OCZ. As per Hardware Canucks guidelines, no video direction was received from manufacturer. As an Amazon Associate we earn from qualifying purchases. 

Gear list (Available on Amazon):

Panasonic GH5 - http://geni.us/nXAbU
Panasonic GH4 - http://geni.us/2hzK
Panasonic G7 - http://geni.us/24nm
Canon C100 - http://geni.us/vDI
Sony RX100m3 - http://geni.us/dtb
Sigma 18-35mm F1.8 - http://geni.us/dLL
Cinevate DUZI Slider - http://geni.us/1Hwt
AKG C314 - http://geni.us/6o9
AKG C 568 B - http://geni.us/1D2S
Zoom H5 - http://geni.us/2LUm

although it isn't expandable which is a bit disappointing the battery is slightly larger on the pixel 2 xl you're looking at roughly 3,500 milliamp hours versus 3300 on the note 8 its ip67
